Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
2 neengal Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Oruvanukkup Pramiyam Undaanaal, Avan Than Pramiyaththinaale Theettaanavan.
3 avanudaiya Maamsaththilulla Pramiyam Oorikkondirundhaalum, Avan Pramiyam Adaipattirundhaalum, Adhinaal Avanukkuth Theettundaagum
4 pramiyamullavan Padukkira Endhappadukkaiyum Theettaagum; Avan Edhinmel Utkaarugiraano Adhuvum Theettaagum.
5 avan Padukkaiyaith Thodugiravan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugakkadavan; Saayankaalammattum Avan Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
6 pramiyam Ullavan Utkaarndhadhinmel Utkaarugiravan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
7 pramiyam Ullavanin Sareeraththaith Thodugiravan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
8 pramiyam Ullavan Suththamaayirukkira Oruvanmel Thuppinaal, Ivan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
9 pramiyam Ullavan Erum Endhachchenamum Theettaayirukkum.

10 avanukkuk Keezhirundha Edhaiyaagilum Thodugiravan Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Adhai Eduththukkondu Pogiravan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
11 pramiyam Ullavan Than Kaigalaith Thanneerinaal Kazhuvaamal Oruvanaith Thottaal, Ivan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
12 pramiyam Ullavan Thotta Manpaandam Udaikkappadavum, Marachchaamaan Ellaam Thanneerinaal Kazhuvappadavum Vendum.

13 pramiyam Ullavan Than Pramiyam Neengi Suththamaanaal, Than Suththigarippukkendru Ezhunaal Ennikkondirundhu, Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Than Thegaththai Ootruneeril Kazhuvakkadavan; Appozhudhu Suththamaayiruppaan.
14 ettaam Naalile, Avan Irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu, Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu, Aasaariyanidaththil Kodukkakkadavan.
15 aasaariyan Avaigalil Ondraip Paavanivaaranapaliyum Matrondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyumaakki, Avanukkaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avan Pramiyaththinimiththam Paavanivirththi Seyyavendum.
16 oruvanilirundhu Indhiriyam Kazhindhadhundaanaal, Avan Thanneeril Muzhugavendum; Saayankaalammattum Avan Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
17 kazhindha Indhiriyam Patta Vasthiramum Tholum Thanneerinaal Kazhuvappattu, Saayankaalammattum Theettaayiruppadhaaga.
18 indhiriyam Kazhindhavanode Sthree Paduththukkondirundhaal, Iruvarum Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaargalaaga.
19 soodhagasthree Than Sareeraththilulla Udhira Ooralinimiththam Ezhunaal Than Vilakkaththil Irukkakkadaval; Avalaith Thodugiravan Evanum Saayankaalam Mattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
20 aval Vilakkalaayirukkaiyil, Edhinmel Paduththukkollugiraalo Edhinmel Utkaarugiraalo Adhellaam Theettaayirukkum.
21 aval Padukkaiyaith Thodugiravan Evanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
22 aval Utkaarndha Manaiyaith Thodugiravan Evanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
23 aval Padukkaiyinmelaagilum, Aval Utkaarndha Manaiyinmelaagilum Irundha Edhaiyaagilum Thottavan, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
24 oruvan Avalode Paduththukkondadhum, Aval Theettu Avanmel Pattadhumundaanaal, Avan Ezhunaal Theettaayiruppaanaaga; Avan Padukkira Padukkaiyum Theettuppadum.

25 oru Sthree Vilagiyirukkavendiyakaalam Allaamal Avaludaiya Udhiram Aneganaal Oorikkondirundhaal, Alladhu Andhak Kaalaththukku Minji Adhu Kandirukkum Naalellaam Oorikkondirundhaal, Than Vilakkaththin Naatkalilirundhadhupola Aval Theettaayiruppaalaaga.

26 andha Naatkalellaam Aval Padukkum Endhappadukkaiyum, Aval Vilakkaththin Padukkaiyaippola, Avalukkuth Theettaayirukkum; Aval Utkaarndha Manaiyum, Avaludaiya Vilakkaththin Theettaippolave Theettaayirukkum.
27 appadippattavaigalaith Thodugiravan Evanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaanaaga.
28 aval Than Udhira Ooral Nindru Suththamaanapodhu, Aval Ezhunaal Ennikkolvaalaaga, Adhinpinbu Suththamaayiruppaal.
29 ettaam Naalile Irandu Kaattuppurakkalaiyaavadhu, Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarakkadaval.

30 aasaariyan Avaigalil Ondraip Paavanivaaranapaliyum, Matrondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyumaakki, Avalukkaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avaludaiya Udhira Ooralinimiththam Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan.

31 isravel Puththirar Thangal Naduve Irukkira Ennudaiya Vaasasthalaththaith Theettuppaduththi, Thangal Theettugalaal Saagaadhapadikku, Ippadi Neengal Avargal Theettugalukku Avargalai Vilakkivaikkakkadaveergal.
32 pramiyamullavanukkum, Indhiriyak Kazhivinaale Theettaanavanukkum,
33 soodhaga Balaveenamullavalukkum, Pramiyamulla Sthree Purusharukkum, Theettaayirukkiravalode Paduththukkondavanukkum Etrapramaanam Idhuve Endraar.
